_documentation: Tool descriptions for LLM-judged metrics. These help the evaluator understand what each tool can and cannot do.

get_available_planting_times.description: Returns available time slots for planting services on a given date.
limitations: Cannot schedule appointments - only returns availability

schedule_planting_service.description: Schedules a planting service appointment for a customer.
capabilities: Book a planting appointment with date and time slot

access_cart_information.description: Retrieves the current contents of a customer's shopping cart.

modify_cart.description: Adds, removes, or updates items in the customer's shopping cart.

get_product_recommendations.description: Returns product recommendations based on query or customer profile.

check_product_availability.description: Checks if a specific product is in stock.

sync_ask_for_approval.description: Requests manager approval for discounts or special actions.
limitations: Cannot apply discounts directly - only requests approval
Requires prior approval request via sync_ask_for_approval

generate_qr_code.description: Generates a QR code for a given data string.
limitations: Returns mock data in test environment
Cannot send QR code via email

send_call_companion_link.description: Sends a link to start a video session with a human expert.
capabilities: Send video session link to customer's phone
limitations: The AI CANNOT see or process video - this connects to a HUMAN expert
The AI should NOT claim it can visually identify anything via this tool
